name: PeerMe MultiSig: Register Multi-Sig
description: Register a multi-sig wallet with a friendly name so it appears in your wallet list. Use this when a user wants to add a new multi-sig to their personal registry for easy access.

description.en: The address of the multi-sig wallet to register.
description.de: Die Adresse der Multi-Sig Wallet, die registriert werden soll.

inputs.name: Name

description.en: A friendly name like 'Treasury' or 'Marketing Fund'.
description.de: Ein freundlicher Name wie 'Treasury' oder 'Marketing Fund'.

inputs.bot: Suggest a descriptive name based on the user's context if they haven't specified one.
